birth_context.metadata: 1920s: Cairo felt interwar modernization, mass culture, and uneven prosperity alongside resource politics, conservative‑religious currents, and sanctions or reforms; locals commonly emphasized frugality or new consumer tastes, family obligation, and neighborhood reciprocity and honor, hospitality, and care in public expression.

formative_context.metadata: 1920s: Berlin felt interwar modernization, mass culture, and uneven prosperity alongside integration and welfare‑state recalibration; locals commonly emphasized frugality or new consumer tastes, family obligation, and neighborhood reciprocity and civic rules, unions, and cultural heritage pride.

1920s: São Paulo felt interwar modernization, mass culture, and uneven prosperity alongside oscillating populism and economic volatility; locals commonly emphasized frugality or new consumer tastes, family obligation, and neighborhood reciprocity and tight‑knit kinship and street‑level solidarity.

current_socio_demographics.societal_perceptions: as a middle-aged man in post-war Paris, expected to be stoic and provide; stigma around emotional vulnerability persists

presenting_problem.summary: prolonged adjustment disorder following spouse loss
